short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension from SignLab for American Sign Language emersion leaning.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ASL Bloom: Sign Language Dictionary allow you to seamlessly integrate our ASL Dictionary directly into your web pages. With the extension enabled, simply click on any underlined word on a page and instantly look up the corresponding ASL sign.

Features:

Instantly look up ASL signs for underlined words on any webpage.
Search for signs directly via the extension
Perfect for learners and signers of all levels.
Unlock the power of ASL while you browse the web with ASL Bloom!
